EmailTemplate.name: Annual Award Lost
EmailTemplate.subject: RnR: Update on award nomination
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Resource__c},
We wanted to reach out and inform you of the status of your award nomination for {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Award_Type__c} of {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Fiscal_Year__c} has been updated to "Lost".
While you may not have won this time, your contributions and efforts were valued and appreciated. The nomination process is highly competitive, and your achievements have not gone unnoticed.
We encourage you to continue your outstanding work, and we hope to see your continued success in future opportunities.
Thank you for your participation, and we look forward to celebrating your achievements in the future.
Best Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
